segments.text: Excuse me , can you tell me which is Bob Rice's office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . It's the third office down this hall . Are you looking for Bob ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . He told me to come by this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , but he's not in the office now . Do you have an appointment ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: An appointment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . What time did he expect you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He said I should come by this morning . He didn't give me a time.He said I could come any time before noon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . He's usually here on Tuesday mornings ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today is Tuesday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . He's usually here , but today he went out to a site on the east side .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's too bad . I need to discuss these plans with him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don't you make an appointment for later in the week ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He's here on Tuesdays , Wednesdays and Fridays . What day did you want to see him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Friday is good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Morning or afternoon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can put you down for ten o'clock . Is that alright ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . My name is Laura Wills .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright . I have you down for ten AM this Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are welcome .
segments.speaker: S2
